main.name: Faris Bokhari
main.description: I have interests in a multitude of programming languages, but am strongest in Java, Python, and C++, and JavaScript. I am quick learner, ready to adapt to any situation, and aim for perfection in all aspects.
main.bio: I am a recent graduate from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign and have completed my B.S. in Computer Science and Advertising. I enjoy working in both web and mobile development and enjoy working with cutting-edge technology. I also enjoy playing soccer and spending time with friends and family.

education.description: Currently enrolled in Programming Languages and Compilers (CS 421), Into to Computer Systems (CS 240), Content Creation (ADV 390), Computational Advertising (ADV 461), Tech and Advertising Campaigns (ADV 492)

work.title: Data Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed an internal global web application for sales and delivery teams to retrieve key data of SAP customers migrating from legacy databases to S/4HANA. Implemented a smart search functionality for quick access to information based on keywords

work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Created mock Twitter feeds and YouTube video page in HTML/CSS/JavaScript to simulate user interaction and behavior
